price: (Kun) burqaa gabroonni Rabbii ishee dhuganiidha. (Karaa fedhanitti) dhangalaafachuu ishee dhangalaafatu.
arabic: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ʿaynan yashrabu bihā ʿibādu al-lahi yufajjirūnahā tafjīran
